if-modes.description: Select an interface to configure filter mode.

if-mode.description: Select an interface to configure filter mode.

mode.description: IP source guard mode, it can be configured as mac-base, ip-base or mac-ip-base.

vlan.description: Prescribe a limit to filter scope of the interface, VLAN-based and mode-based features are merged in the ingress direction and applied on the interface.

if-switches.description: Select an interface to configure filter switch.

if-switch.description: Select an interface to configure filter switch.

switch-state.description: Enable or disable IP source guard function of the specified interface.
